actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by adding the California Trail to the study list.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to add the California Trail to the list of trails to be studied for possible designation as national scenic or historic trails. Requires that the feasibility study pertaining to the California Trail be completed by the end of one complete fiscal year after this amendment is enacted.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by adding the California Trail to the study list.
